articles.title: Poco M6 Pro 5G Now Available in India With 4GB RAM and 128GB Storage: Check Price - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Poco M6 Pro 5G is now available in India in a new RAM and storage option. The smartphone was initially launched in India in August in two RAM and storage variants. The new variant of the smartphone will be available for purchase on September 14 via Flipkart.
articles.content: Poco has introduced a new RAM and storage variant of the Poco M6 Pro 5G in India. The smartphone initially debuted in India in August. It was launched in 4GB RAM + 64GB storage and 6GB RAM + 128GB st… [+1617 chars]

articles.title: Huawei and Xiaomi Reach Global Patent Cross-Licensing Agreement - Huawei
articles.description: Today, Huawei and Xiaomi announced they reached a global patent cross-licensing agreement that covers multiple communications technologies including 5G.
